properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
We unite with Jesus
our Savior Lord.
He who takes away
all the sins of the world. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Seek ye first the Kingdom
of God almighty Father.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Seek food that never spoils
prepared by God the Father.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus said am the bread
came down to you
from heaven.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He who eat my flesh
will live with me forever.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
He who drinks my blood
wonâ€™t suffer death eternal.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
All the words of Jesus
are truly light and spirit.
